original_title: Variations Sur Le Thème D'une Passion
overview: The film tells the erotic story of two images that seek, touch each other, and finally merge. One, the original, the myth, on Dreyer's side, the other the copy, the simulacrum, the image that the director made, and who needs to inscribe his image in the masterpiece from Dreyer's.
title: Variations Sur Le Thème D'une Passion
